item.name: Checkout cart items to create an order

request.name: Checkout cart items to create an order

description.content: Convert cart items for an employee into an order with optional installment payment. If items array is provided, only those specific items will be checked out. Otherwise, all cart items will be checked out. Calculates totals, creates order items, generates installments if payment type is INSTALLMENT, and clears only the checked-out items from the cart.

response.name: Order created successfully from cart
